snippet: A newspaper reported Monday night that two anonymous lawmakers said they had heard Gov. Paul LePage of Maine say at an event that President Obama “hates white people.” He denies it.
abstract: Portland Press Herald reports that two anonymous lawmakers say they had heard Maine Gov Paul LePage say at fund-raising event that Pres Obama 'hates white people'; though LePage denies making comment, he has made so many startlingly blunt assertions that their accumulation may be problematic in his 2014 re-election bid.

byline.original: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and JESS BIDGOOD

lead_paragraph: A newspaper reported Monday night that two anonymous lawmakers said they had heard Gov. Paul LePage of Maine say at an event that President Obama “hates white people.” He denies it.

headline.main: For Maine Governor, Issue Is What They Said He Said
headline.print_headline: For Maine Governor, Issue Is What They Said He Said
